import React from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const baseUrl = "http://127.0.0.1:8000/api"; function Home() { const [courseData, setCourseData] = useState([]); const [teacherData, setTeacherData] = useState([]); const [enrollStatus, setenrollStatus]=useState(); const [ratingStatus, setratingStatus]=useState(); let {course_id}=useParams(); const studentId = localStorage.getItem("studentId"); useEffect(()=>{ try{ axios.get(baseUrl+'/fetch-enroll-status/'+studentId+'/'+course_id).then((res)=>{ console.log(res); if (res.data.bool===true){ setenrollStatus('success') } }); }catch(error){ console.log(error) } //Fetch ratng status try{ axios.get(baseUrl+'/fetch-course-rating-status/'+course_id).then((res)=>{ console.log(res); if (res.data.bool===true){ setratingStatus('success') } }); }catch(error){ console.log(error) } }); //Fetch enrollment status useEffect(() => { try { axios.get(baseUrl + "/course/").then((res) => { setCourseData(res.data); }); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } }, []); useEffect(() => { try { axios.get(baseUrl + "/teacher/").then((res) => { setTeacherData(res.data); }); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } }, []); return (

))}

); } export default Home;
